1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import os
3 import numpy as np
4 import rospy
5 import rospkg
6 import tf
7 from gazebo_msgs.srv import SpawnModel, \
8  SpawnModelRequest, SetModelState, SetLinkState, GetLinkState
9 from gazebo_msgs.msg import ModelState, LinkState, Pose, Quaternion, \
10  Point
11 
12 import sys
13 from SawyerController import SawyerController
14 from PandaController import PandaController
15 
16 
17 class EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager():
18  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
19  """
20  Spawns the IMU model.
21 
22  Arguments
23  ---------
24  `model_names`: `List[str]`
25  The model names for the IMU
26 
27  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
28  `[Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]`
29 
30  `sdf`: `bool`
31  launch from sdf or urdf
32  """
33  self.model_names = model_names
34  self.n = len(model_names)
35  self.sdf = sdf
36  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
37 
38  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
39  if sdf:
40  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
41  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy(
42  '/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
43  model_path = os.path.join(
44  ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
45  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy(
46  '/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
47  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
48  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
49  else:
50  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
51  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy(
52  '/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
53  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
54  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy(
55  '/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
56  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
57  xml_string = f.read()
58 
59  if init_poses is None:
60  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
61  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
62  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
63  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
64  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
65 
66  self.init_poses = init_poses
67  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
68  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
69 
70  def spawn(self):
71  """
72  Spawns the IMU model with the poses defined earlier in
73  `__init__`
74  """
75  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
76  try:
77  self.req.model_name = model_name
78  init_pose = Pose()
79  init_pose.position.x = pose.position[0]
80  init_pose.position.y = pose.position[1]
81  init_pose.position.z = pose.position[2] + 0.77
82  init_pose.orientation.x = pose.orientation[0]
83  init_pose.orientation.y = pose.orientation[1]
84  init_pose.orientation.z = pose.orientation[2]
85  init_pose.orientation.w = pose.orientation[3]
86  self.req.initial_pose = init_pose
87  res = self.spawn_model(self.req)
88  print(res)
89  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
90  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
91 
92  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
93  """
94  Sets the poses of the IMU.
95 
96  Arguments
97  ---------
98  `names`: `List[str]`
99  The names of the IMUs
100 
101  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
102  The poses of the IMUs
103  """
104  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
105  self.set_pose(name, pose)
106 
107  def set_pose(self, name, pose):
108  """
109  Sets a pose of an IMU
110 
111  Arguments
112  ---------
113  `name`: `str`
114  The name of the IMU
115 
116  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
117  The pose of the IMU
118  """
119  if self.sdf:
120  try:
121  state_msg = ModelState()
122  state_msg.model_name = name
123  state_msg.pose = pose
124  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
125  res = self.set_model_state(state_msg)
126  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
127  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
128  else:
129  try:
130  link_msg = LinkState()
131  link_msg.link_name = name
132  link_msg.pose = pose
133  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
134  res = self.set_link_state(state_msg)
135  print(res)
136  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
137  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
138 
139 
140 class TrueIMUBoxStateManager():
141  def __init__(self, names):
142  """
143  TrueIMUBoxStateManager class.
144 
145  Arguments
146  ---------
147  `names`: `List[str]`
148  The names of the IMUs
149  """
150  self.names = names
151  self.n = len(names)
152 
153  self.get_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy(
154  '/gazebo/get_link_state', GetLinkState)
155  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/get_link_state')
156 
157  def get_poses(self):
158  """
159  Gets the poses of the given links
160 
161  """
162  poses = np.zeros((self.n, 7))
163  for i, name in enumerate(self.names):
164  resp = self.get_link_state(name, 'world')
165 
166  if resp.success:
167  pose = resp.link_state.pose
168  poses[i, :] = np.r_[pose.position, pose.orientation]
169 
170  return poses
171 
172 
173 def load_estimated_poses(filename):
174  """
175  Loads the poses
176 
177  Arguments
178  ---------
179  `filename`: `str`
180  The filename to get the `np.array`
181  """
182  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
183  return np.loadtxt(os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'data', filename))
184 
185 
186 if __name__ == '__main__':
187  # rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions")
188  n_joint = 7
189  n_imu = 7
190 
191  robot = sys.argv[1]
192  filename = sys.argv[2]
193 
194  if robot == 'panda':
195  controller = PandaController()
196  elif robot == 'sawyer':
197  controller = SawyerController()
198  else:
199  raise ValueError("Must be either panda or sawyer")
200 
201  poses = load_estimated_poses(filename)
202  positions = np.zeros(poses.shape[0])
203  controller.publish_positions(positions, sleep=1)
204 
205  imu_names = ['imu_link0', 'imu_link1', 'imu_link2',
206  'imu_link3', 'imu_link4', 'imu_link5', 'imu_link6']
207  link_names = ['panda::'+imu_name for imu_name in imu_names]
208  panda_imu_manager = TrueIMUBoxStateManager(link_names)
209  defined_poses = panda_imu_manager.get_poses()
210 
211  # Set initial poses
212  model_names = ['imu%i' % (i)
213  for i in range(n_imu)]
214  init_poses = [Pose(
215  position=pose[:3],
216  orientation=pose[3:]) for pose in poses]
217  state_manager = EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager(model_names, init_poses)
218  state_manager.spawn()
219 
220  error = np.sum(np.linalg.norm(defined_poses - poses))
221  print()
